entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 1:43 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 1:43 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
